title: Wells Fargo Legal Woes Continue in Face of New Scandals (Audio)
itunes:title: Wells Fargo Legal Woes Continue in Face of New Scandals (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- John Coffee, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses a new wave of scandals currently facing Wells Fargo after the San Francisco-based lender warned investors that the latest controversies could result in a record 65 percent surge in legal costs. He speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
